Title: BeeCoders WPF Controls
Description:
Various Wpf user controls. 
This project contains some Wpf users controls that are hard to find as open source on the web.

FileExplorer control
PdfCanvas control
HomeWiki:
This is a collection of custom made Wpf Controls that we use during application development.

So far the collection only has 1 control:

FileExplorer

Simple Wpf File Explorer control.

﻿

August 23 2011: Added real file icons option

Sep 24 2011: Added first stuff to make it also a FTP explorer. Not yet working

 

PdfCanvas

A canvas control that can save its contents as PDF. Uses iTextSharp for this.

 

 

Requirements

.Net Framework 4.0

Visual Studio 2010

 

Background

BeeCoders Wpf Controls is a set of Windows Presentation Foundation Controls that we use or have used in some of our( (BeeCoders) projects. BeeCoders is a small development firm located in Belgium. Please visit our website if you are interested in the projects we are working on http://www.beecoders.com.

Also follow our blog at www.itchycoders.com

Other codeplex projects by BeeCoders:

A WPF user control that allows dynamic creation of controls on a canvas.
